long_description: Versatility at its best, the Patagonia 3-in-1 Snowbelle insulated jacket boasts waterproof protection and a zip-out insulated liner for easy, season-long wear that caters to your needs. 3 different ways to wear the system: wear shell jacket and liner jacket together for maximum protection or wear either piece on its own as weather warrants. 2-layer H2No(R) construction boasts a polyester shell backed with a waterproof, breathable laminate to deliver all-weather protection. Durable Water Repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Embedded RECCO(R) reflector enhances radio signals from search-and-rescue RECCO detectors, helping speed up the search for a buried avalanche victim. Polyester mesh lining helps to moves moisture away from your body for a dry fit; pit zips let you quickly release heat. Adjustable powder skirt helps seal out snow; webbing loops connect to any Patagonia snow pants (sold separately). Removable, 2-way adjustable hood is helmet-compatible and has a stiff visor for optimal visibility in poor conditions. Hem of the Patagonia 3-in-1 Snowbelle insulated jacket cinches to keep chill out; pleated gusset at cuffs fits over or under your gloves to prevent snow from sneaking in. Removable liner jacket features Thermogreen insulation (90% recycled content) that stays warm even when wet; liner jacket is also treated with a Durable Water Repellent finish.
